snippet: Germany’s Florian Mayer, ranked 50th in the world and playing his first hardcourt match since March, defeated Bernard Tomic of Australia, 5-7, 6-3, 6-3, at the Rogers Cup in Montreal.
abstract: Florian Mayer defeats Bernard Tomic in first round of the Rogers Cup tennis tournament in Montreal; other first-round matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Germany’s Florian Mayer, ranked 50th in the world and playing his first hardcourt match since March, defeated Bernard Tomic of Australia, 5-7, 6-3, 6-3, at the Rogers Cup in Montreal.

headline.main: Tomic Falls at Rogers Cup in Montreal
